structure.unit: B LICENSURE AND REGULATION OF HEALTH FACILITIES AND SERVICES

law.catch_line: Student housing not included in KRS 216B.300 to 216B.320.
law.text: Nothing in KRS 216B.300 to 216B.320 shall be construed as requiring registration by persons providing room or board or both to students.
law.history: Created 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 439, sec. 4, effective July 13, 1990.
